articles.title: 67,597 Fresh Covid Cases, 19% Lower Than Yesterday, Positivity Rate At 5% - NDTV
articles.description: India saw a single-day rise of 67,597 new coronavirus infections, raising its tally to 4,23,39,611, while the active cases fell below 10 lakh after around 27 days. The positivity rate has gone down to 5%.
articles.content:
• India's active caseload, which has come down significantly in the last few days, currently stands at 9,94,891.
  • Of the total Covid infections in India, active cases stand at 2.35%.
